TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StylusDeviceCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1<class System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice>

Docs.summary: Contains the objects that represent a Tablet PC's stylus devices.
